topic.title: Checkout Cart
topic.shortdesc: This topic will guide you on how to checkout your cart on the Amazon website.

ol.li: Select Cart in the navigation bar and then select Proceed to Buy.
In the checkout page, select Add a new address and then enter your address.
Choose an address type and selectUse this address.
In "Choose special delivery options," choose the delivery speed of your product and then select Choose special delivery options.
In "Select a payment method," choose a payment method of your choice and then select Use this payment method.
Review your items and select Place Your Order and pay in the "Review items and delivery" section.
Complete your payment in the given time. Now you have placed your order successfully.
Go to Your Account > Your Orders to view your past orders and it's status.
